data.name: Beta Fission Gun
data.info: Range: Medium // Damage: 7 SP // Energy // Burn (2) // Explosive (2) // Heavy // Uses (3)
data.detail: This frankly over-designed weapon fires a huge blast of supercharged fission which engulfs an entire area in superheated green flame

data.name: Monomolecular Sword
data.info: Range: Close // Damage: 4 SP // Deadly // Melee // Silent
data.detail: This blade is formed from a super-hardened carbon lattice, held together by an electro-static charge, and honed to the width of a single molecule. They give off the smell of ozone in the atmosphere as the moisture in the air is cut.

data.name: Miniaturised Repair Arm
data.detail:
This repair arm was developed by Stefanus to allow their field techs to make advanced repairs whilst in combat zones.

*2AP Patch*
`Turn Action // Range: Close`
You restore up to 6 SP to a target Mech in Range with at least 1 SP.

*2AP System Repair*
`Short Action // Range: Close`
You repair a damaged Tech 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 System or Module in Range to Intact Condition. It is now usable.

*4AP Chassis Repair*
`Long Action // Range: Close`
You repair a damaged Tech 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 Mech Chassis or Vehicle in Range to Intact Condition.
It is now usable with 1 SP.

data.name: Polycarbonate Carapace Armour
data.detail: Heavy layers of reinforced carbonate provide excellent protection in the field against all manner of harm one could find in the wastelands. Reduce all damage your Pilot takes by 2 to a minimum of 1 when this Armour is equipped. Apply this after other modifiers.
